mapper.sql: uuid, purchaseprojcode, purchasesectioncode, changeversion, unifieddealcode, xcProjectCode, ProjContactor, ProjContactorPhone, FirstNoticeDate, ChangeDate, OriNoticeURL, ChangeReason, BuyerContact, BuyerContactPhone, AgentContact, AgentContactPhone, PublishTime, Attachment, BulletinType, Platformcode, Placecode, Pubserviceplatcode, Customer, CreateTime, creator, UpdateTime, modifier, publisher, Status, other, vsheetId, changeTextLinkAddress, changeResonLinkAddress, version

Bulletintitle, Purchaseprojname, OriNoticeProjName, otherSupplementaryMatters, NewContent, BuyerName, BuyerAddress, AgentName, AgentAddress, PublishMedia, url, Notes, changeText, reasonFile, richTextContent
mapper.select: select count(*) from change_notice cn,purchase_project pp where cn.purchaseprojcode=pp.purchaseprojcode and cn.PublishTime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

select cn.uuid,cn.Bulletintitle,cn.Createtime from change_notice cn,purchase_project pp where cn.purchaseprojcode=pp.purchaseprojcode and cn.PublishTime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} order by cn.createtime desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{rows,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select count(*) from change_notice where PublishTime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and Bulletintitle like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

select uuid,Bulletintitle,Createtime from change_notice where PublishTime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}and Bulletintitle like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order by createtime desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{rows,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select uuid,Bulletintitle,Createtime from change_notice where PublishTime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} order by createtime desc limit 0,#{toprows,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
